Class DB_Connector

java.lang.Object
skywaysolutions.app.database.DB_Connector

public final class DB_Connector extends Object implements IDB_Connector
This class provides a MySQL IDB_Connector implementation.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public Connection connect(String hostPortCombination, String databaseName, String username, String password) throws CheckedException
      Connects to a MySQL database on the specified host port combinations and database name with the provided username and password.
      Specified by:
      connect in interface IDB_Connector
      Parameters:
      hostPortCombination - The host:port combination (host:port, failoverHost:port...).
      databaseName - The name of the database.
      username - The username to authenticate as.
      password - The password to authenticate as.
      Returns:
      The database connection.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - A connection failure occurs.

    • getStatement

      public PreparedStatement getStatement(String sqlTemplate) throws CheckedException
      Gets a prepared statement for the provided SQL template string. DO NOT forget to use Statement.close() when finished.
      Specified by:
      getStatement in interface IDB_Connector
      Parameters:
      sqlTemplate - The SQL template string.
      Returns:
      The prepared statement for parameterization and execution.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The statement creation failed.

    • close

      public void close() throws CheckedException
      Closes the contained connection.
      Specified by:
      close in interface IDB_Connector
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The closing of a connection has failed.

      Specified by:

      Returns:
